description:
Below are spaces for when you would like to display
items above the recovery items.
name: -----Reserved

description:
A clock that holds ancient angelic power. 
Can use it to set time dilations and go back in time.
name: Antikythera

description: A coin used by devils.
name: Soul Coin

description:
A flower of pure frost. 
Can be used to strengthen bond with Icebreaker.
name: Frozen Flower

description:
A glowing plant, its roots are already regrowing.
Its not helping you but its not hurting you either.
name: Lifeblossom

description: Restores HP by 500 points.
name: Potion

description: Restores HP by 1500 points.
name: Super Potion

description: Completely restores HP.
name: Full Potion

description: Restores MP by 300 points.
name: Magic Water

description: Raises the subject from the dead. (Restores HP by half.)
name: Stimulant

description:
Removes all status ailments.
Cannot revive a someone from being dead.
name: Dispel Herb

description: Cures Poison or Paralysis states.
name: Antidote

description: Restores HP and MP by half.
name: Miracle Drop

description: Completely restores HP and MP.
name: Elixir

description:
Halves the number of enemies you will encounter
for a while.
name: Encounter Decreaser

description:
Increases items and money gained from battle for
a while.
name: Drop Increaser

description: Increases max HP by 50 points.
name: HP Increase

description: Increases max MP by 10 points.
name: MP Increase

description: Increases Attack by 3 points.
name: Attack Increase

description: Increases Defense by 3 points.
name: Defense Increase

description: Increases M.Attack by 3 points.
name: Magic Increase

description: Increases M.Defense by 3 points.
name: Resistance Increase

description: Increases Agility by 3 points.
name: Agility Increase

description: Increases Luck by 3 points.
name: Luck Increase

description: Wear the strange silver mask.
name: Silver Mask

description: An old but sturdy climbing rope.
name: Hunter's rope

description: A master key to most locks on Espada's ship.
name: Overseer's Key

description: Lets you dig up stuff, and tunnel through rat holes.
name: Makeshift Shovel

description:
A Pristine looking berry, highly resistant to this 
harsh enviornment. Restore 100 HP, and 30 Energy.
name: Pristine Berry

description:
This infamous substance has been the bane of many. 
Stuns all targets hit.
name: Arcana Dust(DNU)

description:
Stuns all targets hit.
This infamous substance has been the bane of many.
name: Arcana Dust

description:
Deals physical damage, High Stun chance.
Heavy, pointed, and most importantly; throwable.
name: Warped Horshoe

description:
You will never forget how you were forced 
to learn. Thanks Aela...
name: Lockpick

description:
Grants 50 TP
The vial is coated in ice yet the blood remains.
name: Frosted Vial

description: Grants 75 energy.
name: Old candy

description:
Fully restore all stats and gain a 15% attack/def buff
Your Mother's favorite.
name: Frosted Lavander

description:
Stops Bleed, Poison, Toxic, and plague.
A resiliant plant that can clot blood and fight poison.
name: Red Thyme

description: Restores 10HP and stops bleeding.
name: Clean Linen

description:
Saps mana from mages for 5 turns. 
A cube designed by a famous anti-mage.
name: Goume cube

description:
Grants 30% Magical DEF for 10 turns.
The flame is fake, like magic some say.
name: Anti Magic Candle

description:
Deals Magic Damage.
Hardened over many years, which makes it throwable.
name: Dusted Plume

description:
blind all targets who gaze upon it, 
revealing their inner nightmare, then shatters.
name: Cursed Mirror

description:
"Artificial Frosted Detterent. Activate to summon a
Frostblood wall."
name: FD(DNU)

description:
Powers the Antikythera by 20% Can not use in combat.
A block that says 'Save game'
name: 'Save' Battery Block

description: Brightens Dark areas. Burns webs when first lit.
name: Lantern

description:
Restores 75HP, and 100 Energy.
A high quality potion made for the heat of battle.
name: Hunter's Potion

description:
Restores 50 HP.
You cant tell if it's a potion or wine.
name: Fermented Potion

description: The good stuff. Grants Evasion.
name: Vintage Wine

description: Can be a potion, poison, wine, or bodily fluid. ???
name: Mystery liquid

description:
Restores 20 HP
Still has some healing properties left.
name: Watery Potion

description:
Removes poison and lowers toxic buildup.
A syrup that used to be a household multicure.
name: Rylenol

description: Can be used on lesser locks.
name: Corrosive liquid

description:
Deal high magic damage and daze all enemies.
A failed experiamental concoction.
name: Explosive Concoction

description:
Grants 20% Energy Regen. 
Juice with an incredibly sweet kick.
name: Spiked Dragon Juice

description:
Cleanses all negative effects.
Mythical water that is still fresh.
name: Melusine Water

description:
Restores 100 HP
A sparkling Healing potion.
name: Pristine Potion

description:
Grants 30 HP, high chance of getting sick. 
It smells horrid.
name: Spoiled Broth

description:
Consuming it grants 30% Frostblood.
An icecube that never melts.
name: Frosted Icecube

description:
A thick codex written by your sister.
It explains how to manipulate metals.
name: Metallurgy Codex

description:
Restores 30HP, high chance of getting sick.
The meat is green.
name: Rotten Dog Food

description: Restores 75 HP, 75 Energy, 75% Frostblood
name: Frosted Rations

description:
Restores 50 HP, 50 Energy, 50% Frostblood
Preserved from the sheer cold. Tastes quite good.
name: Frosted Fish

description:
Moderate Chance to stun.
Hard like a rock, inedible, perhaps... throwable?
name: Hardened Potato

description:
Grants 20% Increased Magic Damage for 10 turns.
Can be used as fish bait.
name: Bohemica Shroom

description:
Grants 20 HP. High chance of getting sick.
The bass is crusted with chunks of yellowish ice.
name: Rotten Fish

description:
Grants 70 Energy and increaed energy regeneration. 
Pepper of unknown origins, Can be used as fish bait.
name: Hot and Spicy

description:
Grants 10HP, low chance of getting sick.
It's riddled with black holes.
name: Rotten Egg

description: Grants 20 HP, 20 Energy, 20% Frostblood
name: Frosted Egg

description:
This orb can act as a powersource for the astral
barrier.
name: Angelic Orb A

description:
This orb holds the power of a god. Its energies are 
very familar, yet very terrifying.
name: Goddess Orb A

description:
This orb can act as a powersource for the astral
barrier.
name: Angelic Orb B

description:
This orb holds the power of a god. Its energies are 
very familar, yet very terrifying.
name: Goddess Orb B

description:
This orb can act as a powersource for the astral
barrier.
name: Angelic Orb C(Reserved)

description:
This orb holds the power of a god. Its energies are 
very familar, yet very terrifying.
name: Goddess Orb C(Reserved)

description:
Gaurenteed hit, inflicts bleed, poison, and weakness
(weakness is for spear transformation.)
name: Assasin's Dagger

description: Ramblings of one of the crew members.
name: Crew Log #1

description: Note detailing a growing mutiny.
name: Crew Log #2

description: Note of a rat crew member.
name: Crew Log #3

description:
Letter detailing the final events leading up to 
the mutiny.
name: Overseer's Mutiny Plan

description: Order to shoot any non crew member on sight.
name: Overseer's Orders

description: Scratches of an angry hunter.
name: Hunter's Notes #1

description: Scratches of an angry hunter.
name: Hunter's Notes #2

description: Scratches of an angry hunter.
name: Hunter's Notes #3

description:
A poster detailing heinous crimes of crew members of
this gang. One particular target has close bounty.
name: Pirate Wanted Poster

description: It seems two of the crewmates fell in love...
name: Pirate Love Letter

description:
Notes detailing Espada's regret in dealing with a 
golden angel.
name: Espada's Regretful Notes

description: Inerva's orders about incoming prisoners
name: Inerva's Orders

description: Toll Keeper's reports on the creatures in the vicinity and his abandonment of the bridge.
name: Toll Keeper's Last Letter

description: A Hunter's Map detailing the inside of the blackship.
name: Map: Blackship

description: Captain Lorenzo's updated Sage Forest Map
name: Map: Sage Forest

description: Captain Lorenzo's updated Sage Forest Map
name: Map: Spider Forest

description:
A note describing a situation where a soldier survived
a harpy 'sky snatch' and what he did.
name: Soldier's Note on Harpies

description:
A knight of white captain's rant of their failed
strike mission.
name: Captain Lorenzo's Letter

description: A diary entry describing Princess Vulpes' success in discovering how to utilize a 'lifeblossom'
name: Diary: Vulpes Botanical Research

description:
A letter signed by your mother notififying King Vulpes
of a 'gold device' coming to the forest.
name: Lotus Orders

description: A Mathematician who claims to have met The First Witch.
name: Mad Mathematician's Notes

description: This particular book stands out above the rest.
name: Xilla's Oldest Diary

description:
A special gun lined with magic rope. Allows one to 
grapple up to climbing posts.
name: Hunter's Grapple Gun

description:
This strange fishing rod can extend and retract.
Requires food as bait.
name: Metal Fishing Rod

description: Grants 10% Health Regeneration for 15 turns.
name: Golden Apple

description: Grants 10 Temporary Max HP for 15 turns.
name: Yellow Herb
note:
<itemEffect>
var snowHP = $gameVariables.value(432); // Get the value of variable 432 (SnowHP)
var inCombat = $gameParty.inBattle(); // Check if the player is in combat

if (snowHP >= 100) {
  if ($gameActors.actor(actorId).isStateAffected(stateIdForLegPetrified)) {
    $gameParty.members().forEach(function(actor) {
      actor.removeState(stateIdForLegPetrified);
    });
    if (inCombat) {
      $gameMessage.add("You healed your broken leg!");
    }
  }

  if ($gameActors.actor(actorId).isStateAffected(stateIdForArmPetrified)) {
    $gameParty.members().forEach(function(actor) {
      actor.removeState(stateIdForArmPetrified);
    });
    if (inCombat) {
      $gameMessage.add("You healed your broken arm!");
    }
  }
}
</itemEffect>

description:
Restores 50 HP, 50 Energy. Can be used as fish bait. 
A mushroom that disguises itself as soggy bread.
name: Mushread

description:
Greatly boosts accuracy. Lasts 8 turns. 
Can be used as fish bait.
name: Eyecap

description:
Gain Tipsy.
Powerful grapes that need no fermentation.
name: Dionysus Grapes

description:
Grants the skill lovebite but cannot guard for 10 turns.
A parasitic love fruit.
name: Sickly Sweet

description: Restores 30 HP, high chance of getting sick.
name: Black Fungal Cheese

description: Restore 100 Energy. Gain Energy Regen for 15 turns.
name: Dragonfruit

description: Stops Bleed, Poison, Toxic, and the plague.
name: Red Thyme

description: Restores 50 HP, 50 Energy, 50% Frostblood.
name: Frosted Fungal Cheese

description: The egg is not viable. Restore 30 HP and 30 MP
name: Unviable Harpy Egg

description:
Moderate chance to stun.
The answer is yes, it is most definetely throwable.
name: Rock

description:
Restores 75HP, and 100 Energy.
A high quality potion made for the heat of battle.
name: Hunter's Potion

description:
Prevent a lesser enemy's Porta Mortis from 
triggering.
name: Voided Soul Coin

description: Playing this harp counters all sound abilities for 4 turns.
name: Harp of Sound Dominance

description: Make a deal with the fairy: Retore Full Health/Energy or Gain combat death protection.
name: Fairy in a bottle

description: Contains frostblood? Retore 50 frostblood.
name: Blue Rainwater

description:
Can be a potion, poison, wine, or bodily fluid.
Who knows.
name: Mystery liquid

description:
It smells horrid.
Grants 30 HP, high chance of getting sick.
name: Blackwater

description: A sparkling Healing Mixture. Restores 100 HP
name: Pristine sparkling water

description:
Restores 20 HP
Still has some healing properties left.
name: Clouded sparkling water

description:
A stone tablet with angelic symbols. Giving it
to lussuria will increase her progress.
name: Angelic Tablet

description:
These tools can assist with building 
defensive fortifications.
name: Blacksmith Tools

description:
Restores 75 HP, 75 Energy.
A very fresh and hearty fish.
name: Sea Cod

description:
Restores 25 HP, 25 Energy.
Yuck. You very much dislike Anchovies.
name: Anchovy

description:
Restores 100 HP, 100 Energy.
Permanently gain the 'second wind' passive
name: Killer Shark

description: A Lantern fueled by Rezlo. It has infinite uses.
name: Rezlo's Candelabra

description:
This belongs to Rezlo, returning it to him may prove
useful.
name: Rezlo's Dull Candelabra

description: Assasinate enemies in the overworld, can only be used in sniper locations.
name: Leechion's Sniper Rifle

description: Deal moderate M.Damage. Expires at end of combat.
name: Fleeting Bomb
